channel.title: Best Practices on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Best Practices on Blowfish

item.title: Hugo Content Tips
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description: Docsy is a theme for the Hugo static site generator. If you’re not already familiar with Hugo this page provides some useful tips and potential gotchas for adding and editing content for your site. Feel free to add your own!

item.title: Organizing Your Content
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description: If you have a look at our Example Site, you’ll see that we’ve organized the Documentation section into a number of subsections, each with some recommendations about what you might put in that section.
